page.title: 04Tourism-Boswinger
page.content: This is recognised as one of Britains finest campsites.It has been featured on television and radio and has won the A.A.award'Best in Britain'title and the English Tourist Board Rose Award in 1984 and 1985.It is owned by the Michell family who have farmed on this site since the early 1500s.The site is 16 acres.When it is full there are 900 to 1000 people each night.The site is split into two parts camping and static caravans.There are 172 pitches for tents and 55 static caravans.There is a heated swimming pool,adventure playground,shop and dairy.The toilets and shower blocks are luxurious with free hot water.The park is landscaped with gardens,trees,shrubs and flowers everywhere.Almost everyone who spends a holiday at Boswinger comes again.
